Notes: Use this for filtering by years
label: Year of observation (2010 or 2015)
description: 2008-12 5-year ACS data is labeled 2010. 2013-17 data is labeled 2015.

Notes: Identifies census tracts that are part of the 100 largest metro areas (=1). These are the tracts for which metro-normed opportunity levels are available.
label: In one of the 100 largest metro areas
description: This variable is equal to 1 if the census tract is located in one of the 100 largest metro areas (as of 2015), zero if located in a metro- or micropolitan area that does not belong to the 100 largest metro areas, and blank if it is located outside a metro- or micropolitan area.

Notes: Use this for filtering/selecting metro areas, e.g., if the user types "Boston"
label: Metro/Micro Area (2015) Name

Notes: Use this for filtering/selecting states, e.g., if the user types in "Delaware". In the controls, the full state name should be shown. I have added a crosswalk to the COI20_data folder.
label: State USPS Code
Number of children who are American Indian and Alaska Native
description: The number of children aged 0-17 who are American Indian and Alaska Native alone. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.

label: Number of children who are Asian or Pacific Islander
description: The number of children aged 0-17 who are Asian or Pacific Islander alone. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.

label: Number of children who are black or African American
description: The number of children aged 0-17 who are black or African American alone. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.

label: Number of children who are Hispanic or Latino
description: The number of children aged 0-17 who are Hispanic or Latino. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.

label: Number of children who are some other race or two or more races
description: The number of children aged 0-17 who are some other race alone or two or more races. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.

label: Number of children who are not non-Hispanic white
description: The number of children aged 0-17 who are not non-Hispanic white alone. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.

label: Number of children who are non-Hispanic white
description: The number of children aged 0-17 who are white alone, not Hispanic or Latino. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.

label: Number of children
description: The number of children aged 0-17. Source: 5-Year American Community Survey Summary Files.
